data.description:
A guild dedicated to the exploits of gun Jesus.

Posts do not need to be of the forgotten weapons series but should be about a forgotten weapon that is along the lines of something Ian would cover 

If youre an aspiring or successful gun smith or builder check out +gunsmithing +DIYguns or +Ruqqusrust Maybe some day your work will be featured here.

data.description:
All things NBA basketball!

Rule #1: Posts made need to be related to the NBA in some way. News stories indirectly pertaining to the NBA are also allowed.

Rule #2: Please be kind and considerate to others. Use common sense and be mindful of the golden rule while here.

We are always looking for assistance in making this guild better. If you have suggestions or are looking to be a mod/guildmaster let us know. Off to the games and discussion!

GM Discord usernames: 

@Lukginzis#1678

**Other Sports Guilds**

+NFL

+Hockey

+baseball

+CFB

+CollegeBasketball

+Sports

**Other NBA Team Guilds**

+Mavericks 

+Bucks

+Pacers

**Other NBA Related Guilds**

+NBA_Draft

+fantasybball

data.description:
**Carnivore, ketovore, zero-carb, animal based...** there are as many different reasons people come to choose this lifestyle as there are variations on how to do it "right."

So, instead of getting stuck on diet dogma, I hope this guild will be a place to discuss everything Carnivore - in all it's variations - for anyone looking for genuine discussion on how to succeed on this path.

What wont it be? A place to debate if animal products should even be consumed or wholefoods are no different to highly processed foods.

+Carnivore is pro-meat, pro-food choice and pro-personal responsibility.
data.description_html:
Carnivore, ketovore, zero-carb, animal based... there are as many different reasons people come to choose this lifestyle as there are variations on how to do it "right."

So, instead of getting stuck on diet dogma, I hope this guild will be a place to discuss everything Carnivore - in all it's variations - for anyone looking for genuine discussion on how to succeed on this path.

What wont it be? A place to debate if animal products should even be consumed or wholefoods are no different to highly processed foods.

+Carnivore is pro-meat, pro-food choice and pro-personal responsibility.
data.name: Carnivore
